div.p: Defines a Base. The FHIR StructureDefintion Element has an id attribute and an extension element which have in V3 another meaning.
The V3 datatype II (Instance Identifier) contains an attribute @extension.
V3 classes like ClinicalDocument, Act have an id Element.

description.value: Defines a Base. The FHIR StructureDefintion Element has an id attribute and an extension element which have in V3 another meaning.

definition.value: Base for Logical Models and Element
Base for Logical Models and Element
